summary: A wheelchair-bound young woman returns to her father's estate after ten years, and although she's told he's away, she keeps seeing his dead body on the estate.
cast: Susan Strasberg|Ronald Lewis|Ann Todd|Christopher Lee|John Serret|Leonard Sachs|Anne Blake|Fred Johnson|Heinz Bernard|Bernard Browne|Rodney Burke|Brian Jackson|Richard Klee|Madame Lobegue|Frederick Rawlings|Frederick Schrecker|Gordon Sterne
title: El sabor del miedo
